intro_only_event_multi_newyearsgift_2021:
Hey! I got you a present to celebrate the
new year!
Here’s to a year of good health and prosperity!
That’s great, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I hear other people are giving out presents, too!
Make sure you stop by again tomorrow!
Hey, you made it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Here’s a little present from us. Don’t be shy
now—take it!

It was great to meet so many Trainers and
Pokémon last year!
I hope we have lots of fun battles this year, too!
Oh! There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

I got you a New Year’s present! I hope we can
hang out more this year!
Hmph. You seem pleased.

Don’t be careless and let your guard down. That’s
how mistakes happen.
That’s right! Stay alert!

Just be careful not to get so excited that you
hurt yourself!

Hey there! On behalf of everyone from Hoenn,
we wish you a happy New Year!
We got you something, too!

I already used up the present my dad gave
me, though.
That’s so typical of you, Brendan...

Let’s do our best this 
year, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You’re late! I’m fining you a New Year’s present
and ten million coins!

Keep dillydallying, and the whole year is gonna
pass you by before you know it!
There he goes, rushing things again...

Anyway, let’s try that again! Happy New Year!
You know, we—

You done yet? Let’s hurry up and have
some battles!
Hey! Wait for me!
Ta-da! I have your New Year’s present right here!

Let’s keep taking that brave first step to start
new challenges!

I wonder what kinds of sync pairs we’ll be able to
battle this year!

Yeah! We’ll have to do our best to stay on top
of things!

Thanks for all your help last year, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Here’s a little something from all of us!

Let’s promise to keep on battling together and take
on more amazing Trainers!

Yes, let’s keep doing our best this year so we can
look back on it with no regrets!
Happy New Year, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

We got you a present to celebrate the start of a
bright new year!
I hope good things happen to you this year.

OK, you two! Time to hit the fashion district and
snag some New Year’s sales!
O-OK...I’d be happy to!

Hullo! I’ve got a New Year’s present for you.
Go on, take it!

There are so many Trainers to meet on Pasio!
It’s lots of fun!

But there are lots of strong Trainers in Galar, too,
you know.

I think everyone on Pasio would be shocked to see
what we Galar Trainers are capable of!
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

I guess we’re the last group, but we have a
present for you...

Everyone from Alola wishes you a happy
New Year!

*chuckle* If there’s anything else you want, just
let me know, OK?
Oh, Mom...
*sigh* So typical.
